sentences.sentence: You will, in addition, pay to the bank any losses, costs, expenses or legal fees (including tax thereon).
sentences.translation: 另外，你还必须向银行支付所有损失、成本、花销或律师费(及与此相关的增值税)。

sentences.sentence: And they shall take away the ashes from the altar, and spread a purple cloth thereon.
sentences.translation: 要收去坛上的灰，把紫色毯子铺在坛上。

sentences.sentence: Life is a leaf of paper white, thereon each of us may write his word or two. A. Lowell.
sentences.translation: 生活是一张白纸，每个人都在上面写上自己的一两句话。
